name: Quick and Easy Grilled Potatoes
author: stylistmama
summary: These are like a baked potato, but better! This recipe is so simple and makes a delicious side dish, a 'baked' potato that is soft in the middle and perfectly grilled on the outside.  We dip ours in sour cream and green onions!
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Poke each potato with the tines of a fork
Place the potatoes in a microwave oven, and cook on high power for about 5 minutes
Check about halfway through, and turn potatoes over for even cooking
Slice each potato in half the long way and cook potatoes another 2 minutes on high power
Preheat a grill for medium heat
Brush the potato tops with olive oil, and season with salt and pepper to taste
Cook on prepared grill for 15 to 20 minutes, turning once
